name: 冬冬
greetingText: I'm really lucky to have met you!
wishText: I want you to have all the good things ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Feliz Navidad...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back give me a kiss.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
